comment.author: 26375439@N03
comment._content:
Interesting expression "a sanguinary battle", which today might mean 'healthy' or perhaps even good mannered, back then (in this context) probably meant 'violent and bloody'!

A fascinating bit of history from the Sandwich Islands!

comment.author: 81524598@N00
comment._content: I'm a descendant of Kekuaokalani's sister.  Thank you for posting this interesting piece of family history.
